name: Ahu-Nixta Drudge
description: The Ahu-Nixta Drudge is a medium-sized aberration, characterized by its reliance on clockwork armor for protection and functionality. It has whirring blades for melee attacks and appears as a somewhat shapeless mass within the armor.
memorable: Its dependency on clockwork armor for survival makes the Ahu-Nixta Drudge uniquely vulnerable; if the armor is destroyed, it dies.
goals: Typically, it seeks to engage in combat while utilizing its magical abilities for offense and defense.
relations: Often encountered alongside other aberrations or constructs that share a similar clockwork nature.
environment: Usually found in locations where aberrations are prevalent, such as ancient ruins or laboratories.
strengths: Possesses damage immunities to poison and psychic attacks, along with several condition immunities.
weaknesses: Completely defenseless if its clockwork armor is destroyed.
attacks: Uses whirring blades for melee attacks, dealing slashing damage to enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Innate spellcasting which allows it to cast fire bolt at will and fear once per day.
equipment: Clockwork armor that both protects and enables it to manipulate objects.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing strategic advantages in low-light situations.
skills: Skilled in perception, enabling it to notice hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Immunities to charming, exhaustion, and various other conditions.
Clockwork Encasement ability ties its survival to its armor.
Immutable Form ability grants protection from spells that could change its shape.
Intelligence-based spellcasting with a spell save DC of 11.
Deals significant slashing damage in close combat with its whirring blades.
spellcasting: Can cast fire bolt at will and fear once per day.
test_queries: spellcasting creature immune to shape change
creature dependent on armor for survival
